definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: She tries to back track, but the President simply walks away.
sentences.chinese: 她试图重新回到话题，但总统一言不发地走开了。

sentences.english: She turned and flung out without a word.
sentences.chinese: 她转过身，一言不发就愤然离开了。

sentences.english: As Palmer hugs his daughter, Sherry passes him without saying a word.
sentences.chinese: 帕默拥抱着他的女儿，雪莉一言不发地从他身边走过。

sentences.english: He led her home, but she did not speak a single word the whole way.
sentences.chinese: 然后王子领着新娘回去了，可一路上新娘却一言不发。

sentences.english: The Queen of Scots was silent. She stood like a stone.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰女王一言不发，像座石像一样站在那里。

sentences.english: As Palmer hugs his daughter Sherry passes him without saying a word.
sentences.chinese: 帕默拥抱着他的女儿，雪莉一言不发地从他身边走过。

sentences.english: Mr. Darcy said very little, and Mr. Hurst nothing at all.
sentences.chinese: 达西先生说话不多，赫斯脱先生完全一言不发。

sentences.english: Without a word, she turned and swept out.
sentences.chinese: 她一言不发，转过身昂着头走了出去。

sentences.english: CEO After reading our mouths shut, locking it into the drawer.
sentences.chinese: 总裁看了以后，一言不发，把它锁进抽屉。

sentences.english: "Without uttering a word, they got through to the decision-maker," Diamond explains.
sentences.chinese: “他们一言不发地直接找到了决策者，”戴蒙解释到。

sentences.english: Full of tender feelings, she gazes at Xiao Wang, and says nothing.
sentences.chinese: 她一言不发，只是温情脉脉地注视着小王。

sentences.english: Fishing out his pipe, he filled it and puffed at it without a word.
sentences.chinese: 他掏出烟斗，装满烟丝，一言不发地抽了起来。

sentences.english: But I said nothing because I didn't like this strange house.
sentences.chinese: 但是我一言不发，因为我并不喜欢陌生的房子。

sentences.english: This funster is examining this canvas silent as the gravely.
sentences.chinese: 这位幽默家一言不发地审视着这幅油画。

sentences.english: The executioner put down his axe and stood quietly.
sentences.chinese: 刽子手放下了斧子，一言不发地站着。

definition: to not say a word (idiom)/to keep silent
as if nothing had happened (idiom); calmly/nonchalantly
